awd_titl_txt: Postdoctoral Research Fellowship in Plant Biology
awd_abstract_narration: This award funds a Research Fellowship in Plant Biology for two                 years.  This project is entitled "Molecular cloning and                         characterization of the exocellobiohydrolase I gene family from the             wood rotting fungus Phanerochaete chryosoporium.                                                                                                                The research Fellowships in Plant Biology are granted to applicants             trained in traditional areas of plant biology who wish to extend                their training in new techniques and to those trained in molecular              or cellular techniques who wish to gain experience working with                 plants.  These fellowships are designed to increase the number of               outstanding you scientists in plant biology.***//
org_div_long_name: Division of Molecular and Cellular Biosciences
